## Plane.initWithPoints() method

Initialize the plane by three points on the plane.

**Signature:**

```typescript
initWithPoints(p0: Vector3, p1: Vector3, p2: Vector3): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  p0 | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | The first point. |
|  p1 | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | The second point. |
|  p2 | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | The third point. |

**Returns:**

this

self
